backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing chat features including users, messages, media, emojis, and profile management with access control and blob storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing favicon-related requirements, affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries of multiple frontend source files and their recent UI or logic changes.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base and theme variable definitions for light and dark modes using OKLCH color tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point defining title, favicon links, root container, and module script for the frontend app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component managing session-backed user profile state and conditionally rendering JoinScreen or ChatScreen.
frontend/src/components/ChatScreen.tsx: Full chat interface handling messages, media uploads, profile editing, emoji/GIF pickers, and auto-scrolling behavior.
frontend/src/components/EmojiPicker.tsx: Emoji picker UI allowing browsing and uploading custom emoji images with validation and mutation calls.
frontend/src/components/GifPicker.tsx: React GIF picker that loads trending or searched GIFs from Giphy and returns a selected URL.
frontend/src/components/JoinScreen.tsx: User onboarding form that handles username entry, optional profile picture upload, and user creation.
frontend/src/components/MessageItem.tsx: Renders an individual chat message with avatar, timestamp, text, emojis, and media.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context with login, logout, state management, and persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React-query hooks for messages, counts, media upload, sending messages, and loading default pictures.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind layers and sets a lightâ€‘mode theme using OKLCH CSS variables with a custom font.
frontend/src/lib/config.ts: Provides GIPHY API configuration including endpoints, defaults, and a dev API key.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and session-stored values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, radii, animations, and enabling typography, container queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Metadata describing project state, feature requirements, favicon needs, and pending domain/title updates.
